title: Secret Moon
description: When Yuta sets out to learn the truth about glam Jrocker Miji Makana's mysterious disappearance, he uncovers an outrageous sex scandal--and a carefully guarded secret. Can the fry cook he's falling for really be Miji? Publisher's Note: This book contains explicit sexual content, graphic language, and situations that some readers may find objectionable: Anal play/intercourse, exhibitionism, homoerotic sex (m/m), masturbation, menage ( m/m/f, m/m/m), voyeurism. Previous titles: Orange Moon, Winter Song, Under a Silver Moon.
author: Barbara Sheridan
